pages.text: Terra Moss is one of the two herbs initially available to a budding druid, with an affinity for the connection between plants and the earth. Terra Moss Spores can be found by breaking tall grass - however, Terra Moss does not grow like a conventional crop.

Terra Moss Spores can be planted on cobblestone that is adjacent to water to transform the cobblestone into moss stone - and Terra Moss itself can be harvested from moss stone by using $(l:basics/runic_shears)Runic Shears$(). This process changes the moss stone back into cobblestone.$(br2)Moss stone found through other means may also be harvested for Terra Moss.
